name: Hausetopia
0:
”Alexa, show front door camera”
”Alexa, show office camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hausetopia is an universal solution for ultimate control of IoT devices.

This skill will enable you to control your ThroughTek approved IoT devices, such as IP cameras, by voice.

To use this skill, enable it here and download Hausetopia APP to make a purchase for this skill. 

To configure Hausetopia skill, please do the following;
1. Make sure that your IoT devices are online and operating correctly in Hausetopia APP.
2. Enable this skill and sign in with your Hausetopia account to get started.
3. Simply say: “Alexa, discover devices.” to find available devices on your Hausetopia account.
4. You can now use the Hausetopia by requesting to see or trigger your devices by voice commands.

With an IP camera, you can view activity from it, say:
“Alexa, show living room camera.”

To stop your IP camera, say:
“Alexa, stop.”

For more information, please visit https://www.throughtek.com.tw/ or contact hausetopia_support@tutk.com.
